subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Montreal right wing Brandon Prust was suspended for two games, while Rangers left wing Daniel Carcillo drew a 10-game suspension for bumping an official after going after Prust following the hit.
snippet: Montreal right wing Brandon Prust was suspended for two games, while Rangers left wing Daniel Carcillo drew a 10-game suspension for bumping an official after going after Prust following the hit.
